entities.name: frank
entities.description: The protagonist of the story who is investigating an intruder. He is described as turning right on the landing and approaching a door with caution.

entities.name: my lord
entities.description: A title used by someone in the room, likely the owner or occupant of the house. It is mentioned in a conversation between two people.

relationships.description: Frank hears My Lord's voice from within the room, indicating that he is aware of My Lord's presence and can hear his conversation.
